title: Executive Order 9270-Correcting Executive Order No. 9257 of October 15, 1942, Enlarging Naval Petroleum Reserve No. 1
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, it is ordered that the land description contained in Executive Order No. 9257 of October 15, 1942, enlarging Naval Petroleum Reserve No. 1, in California, be, and it is hereby, corrected to read as follows:
T. 30 S., R 24 E.,     secs. 21 and 22, all;     sec. 23, S½, NW¼NW¼, S½NW¼, and SW¼NE¼;     sec. 24, S½SW¼ and SW¼SE¼;     secs. 25, 26, 27, 35 and 36, all.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9270-Correcting Executive Order No. 9257 of October 15, 1942, Enlarging Naval Petroleum Reserve No. 1 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372331
